expectations: An authentic, high value experience for attendees and sponsors focused on UI-centric JavaScript and web development.

The top priority for HalfStack is the attendee experience, with great food, drinks, talks, swag, and community. Co-hosted by London’s longest-lived JavaScript meetup group and the organisers of Future Sync, HalfStack is a UI-centric, one-day single track conference.

HalfStack carefully curates talks that inspire and inform the audience in a highly interactive and entertaining manner. An intimate feeling where each attendee has time to meet one another; maximum capacity for HalfStack Newquay is 150 attendees.
Organizations are invited to help our event through sponsorship. Choose from our sponsor levels or propose your own.
